1.content:
Now which group do we follow?

Group A:
A bunch of middle management ladies out for a stroll.

Group B:
Curious clubhoppers who stumble upon the genie.

Group C
A rowdy bikergang whose cross country antics have lead them to this supernatural being.

Group D
A small book reading clique who never expected their session to become so strange.

Group E
Misfits and outcasts whose day got a whole lot more weird with the added spice of a genie.
1.title: The Sets of Girls

11.content:
It was about 4 in the afternoon on a Tuesday. Work for many places had just gotten out. It was an absolutely lovely day, so a small group of women decided to take the opportunity to go on a stroll through the park.

All five of them worked at Whitman Inc., a tech company specializing in the latest in consumer tech. Work was usually hectic, and paid overtime was common, so today was a rare treat.

"Geez, I thought we'd never get done!" A tall redhead declared. "You need to really lighten up on the workloads, Nia."

"I'm your manager." A slim, tan blonde replied. "I'm not supposed to go easy on any of ya!"

"Gotta agree with Jean." A short, curvy brunette said. "You put us through the wringer today."

"You still got those reports done, didn't you Claire?" Nia asked.

"All I wanna do is go home..." A plump blonde interjected. "I can practically hear my bed calling to me."

"...is that a perfume bottle?" A slim brunette asked, stopping the group.

She was pointing to a bench, where a small, ornate bottle was laying. Confused, the five women walked up to it. The girl who pointed it out picked it up.

"You probably shouldn't be doing that Leah." The short woman said.

"Relax Emma. It's just a bottle." Leah said, before looking the bottle over. It seemed old, ancient even. Leah carefully pulled the stopper out.

Immediately, a pink smoke filled the air. There was a few seconds of coughing before it faded. And standing in front of the group was a tall man with white hair and a big scowl.

"Friggin' finally!" The man yelled. "20 years stuck in that thing. Alright, names Lou. I'm a genie. Who wants a wish?"

The group stared at the man for a moment. The first person to speak up was...

(OK, let me give some bios for the girls:

Nia Keller. 33. A slim, blonde Caribbean-American woman. She's the manager of one of Whitman Inc.'s floors. She's serious on work, but a very friendly woman when off the clock.

Jean Holland. 30. A tall redheaded woman. A cheery girl, Jean always tries to help where she can. Married to Eric Holland, a science teacher.

Claire Collins. 27. A rather short, but curvy brunette. A party girl, Emma will take any reason to go out and get drunk and dance. Currently living with her girlfriend Tanya.

Emma Bell. 25. A fairly tall and somewhat chubby blonde. Emma is a strange woman. She IS a hard worker, but she is also quite lazy. She'd love to have any chance to go home early, or even work from home.

Leah Greene. 22. A slim brunette with heterochromia (giving her a green eye and a blue eye). Just out of college, Leah started at Whitman Inc., but is worried she isn't really fitting in.)
11.title: Office Ladies

choices: Her wish is granted an hour later
Nia is allowed by Lou to be taken home.
111.content:
Okay, well,technically Nia was the first to speak up but before that most of the women released a reassuring "ahhhhhh!"

That went on for nearly ten minutes and it was surprising that nobody came near them to inspect the commotion.The man tapped his foot as he waited for the women to lose breath. After their yell of shock, the women stared at the man in front of them.

"Let me repeat once more, ahem." The man spoke. "Alright, names Lou. I'm a genie. Who wants a wish?"

The five shared glances at one another in confusion before they turned to the figure in front of them. Nia hesitantly stepped forward to ask a question.

"Hello? What are you?" Her Caribbean accent briefly punctuated her normally controlled voice.

"I cam out of a bottle with smoke, I'm granting you each a wish, and I look Arabic." Lou rubbed his chin. "Obviously I'm a griffon. I'm freaking with all of you fine ladies, I'm a djinn! Genie for you lame tongues."

"This has to be a dream." Jean mumbled.

"If its a dream, then everyone has to be in their underwear!" Lou cried out. All five women cried out in shock as their clothes puffed out of existence.Smiling, Lou nodded his head and instantly the five were clothed once more.

"See. Now tell me your desires."

"In front of our peers? In public as well?" Emma gasped. Lou rolled his eyes,he pointed behind the five to show the world had stopped moving.

"It'll will recommence once you tell me your desires. Any answer will be heard only by me, so you can say any deep,and dark, secret and your friends will never even known you said it."

Nia gulped and spoke her words.

"Is this effect on now?"

"Yes, ask away."

Nia felt like a child in front of a school's principal, she shuffled for a bit until she formulated an answer.

"Can...can you grant me a larger bust? My chest is quite eyecatching mind you,but I'm looking for something a smidge larger."

She turned to her friends and waited for their laughter,but none came. In fact it seemed they were talking to Lou as well. Lou mumbled something and Nia could feel a tingle travel through her body.
111.title: Nia Keller

choices: ...casually joke around (they had their memories changed)

1111.content:
Nia could feel a warmth going through her body after she made her wish. Looking down, she saw that her wish actually had come true: her boobs had started to grow.

She watched as the front of her business suit's blazer filled out, her breasts entering the D cup range. She'd always liked her looks, but did feel from time to time that she could benefit from having a larger bust. And now she was getting just that.

As her breasts swelled into F cups, she turned to look at the others. They weren't looking in her direction, so they couldn't see her growth.

"You know, I'm friggin' sick of humans." Lou said. "400 years of granting, and not once have I had a human who wished for something meaningful. I can end hunger, stop wars, and even bring world peace! But no, it always selfish shit like 'I want a million dollars', 'I wanna work from home', 'I want bigger boobs'. Well fine, you want bigger boobs?! You can have them!"

Now sitting on the ground, Nia watched as her bust finally started to slow it's growth and eventually stopped. Her breasts now seemed to be the size of prize-winning pumpkins, filling her entire lap, and weighed about three times as much.

"Um, can I wish for them smaller? Or to weigh less?" Nia asked nervously.

"Sorry, nope." Lou replied. "Five wishes per bottle opening. And your friends just used up the other 4. You want another wish, you gotta find me again. See ya!" With that, Lou vanished in a puff of pink smoke, the bottle vanishing too.

All at once, people started moving again, and Nia discovered that her blazer had been repaired and made to fit her now immense bust. People were obviously staring at her, including her friends.

After a few seconds, her friends helped Nia up and started to...
1111.title: Wish Granted

choices: Nia finds her home as normal as before

11111.content:
"So did you get your wish?" Emma, the youngest of the group,questioned. Nia looked around at the others to find out they hadn't had any physical change. Which was quite embarrassing for the Caribbean woman. She looked up to Emma.

Emma had a game system tucked under her arm. The young gal raised an eyebrow in response.

"Um boss? What did you wish for?"

"You don't have to tip-toe around me Emma, it is quite evident." Nia sighed. "A larger bust."

"Really." Claire came over with a bottle of something. When did she get that? "You're already pretty big boss lady. I don't think you'd want to be any larger."

"Are all of you joking with me? Look at me!"

"Yeah how could we not?" Claire snark at Nia caused her to fume.

"Anyways it looks like that genie took away your wheelchair, so unless that was your wish,that bastard owes us." Leah noted. "Come on girls, lets bring the boss home."

With that being stated, the four women crowded around Nia and picked her up. Emma and Claire taking Nia's arms,while Leah and Jean had boob duty. Nia blushed as the four walked with her step by step. People looked at the sight, and she swore she heard a child or two laugh.

11111.title: A Changed World

choices: ...try to walk to the bathroom herself.
111111.content:
It took a few minutes of slow walking, but the group finally made it into Nia's apartment. Thankfully, it was on the first floor... which confused Nia, since before the wish she lived on the 4th floor.

Unlocking and entering the apartment, the four friends took Nia over to her couch and set her down on it. They then collapsed in some nearby seats, exhausted.

Nia took a moment to look around her apartment. It looked almost normal, but she saw there were a few changes. There were railings lining the walls, the doors seemed wider, and there was a wheelchair next to the couch.

Looking down, Nia saw a picture that had been taken last year at a company outing. It showed Leah and Jean winning a potato sack race while Nia, Claire, and Emma watched. But in the photo, Nia's boobs were just as massive as they are now, and she was in a wheelchair.

She stopped looking at the picture when she heard the others stand up.

"Sorry, we need to head home." Jean said. "I've got... plans with Tyler for the coming week. You going to be alright on your own?"
Nia stared for a moment, then nodded. The others nodded too, and started to leave. Leah was the last to leave, and she looked back to Nia.

"Anything goes wrong, remember to call us." Leah said, before leaving.

Nia sat on the couch for a moment, staring at her colossal bust. She wanted bigger boobs, but this was not what she meant. As she started, she noticed something next to the photo that hadn't been there before: a note. She picked it up and read it. The note read:

'It's Lou. You probably need some explaining on what's happening, so here's the deal: I changed your personal history. When you were 20, your breasts started growing. The doc's diagnosed you with Macromastia, and you've been growing ever since. Legally, you're considered disabled, but you still work. Only you remember your real past. Oh, and no matter what, your breasts will always be extremely heavy, and you will always have back pain.'

Nia stared at the note, irritated. That genie completely screwed her over. Sighing, she decided she needed a bath. She looked at the bathroom door, then to the wheelchair. After a moment of debating, she decided to...

"Alright Nia,you can do this." Nia said to herself as she pushed up from the couch. She grunted in annoyance from the weight, it was heavy! Her skin was surprisingly resilient to her chest's gravity. Still physics did a number on her back,her spin felt like it was on fire.

11111123.content:
Realizing that it was going to take a while for the tub to fill, Nia decided to leave the bathroom. She did need to see what else had changed about her life.

Grabbing the rim of the tub, Nia summoned all of her strength and pulled herself up. It took a full minute, but Nia managed to get standing again. Panting, she lumbered out of the bathroom.

She managed to walk into her bedroom, thankfully right next to her bathroom. Inside, her bed was twice as large as it use to be, and there were bars set up over it. She guessed those were to help her get out of bed. Other then that, her bedroom looked the same, including the flat screen TV on the far wall.

Slowly walking, Nia looked around the room, eventually locating a photo album. Opening it, she wanted to see just how things had changed.

The first 20 years of her life were the same: her family moving from the Bahamas to the US, her years of schooling, and her various birthdays. Every image after her 20th birthday, though, showed her bust steadily increase in size over the years. In her college graduation alone, she apparently was an M cup according to the note underneath.

Sighing, Nia closed the album and set it down. She then slowly made her way back to the bathroom. Inside, she saw the tub getting half full. She noticed a line in the tub, and guessed that was how full she should make it. So she shut the tub off, disrobed, and got in the tub.
------

-------
Nia awoke the next morning fully rested. She tried to sit up, only to be stopped by her bust.

"Oh, right." Nia muttered. She looked at her bedside clock. 7:15. She needed to get ready for work. But what would work be like in this new reality? Honestly, she was worried. She could call in and ask for one day off, but she was one of the hardest workers there. She was a manager, after all.
After some internal debating, she decided to...

info.brief_description: A multitude of wishes that have went haywire.
info.description:
A group of five girls come across a genie and thinks he's benign, he's not. Angry at humans, the genie decides he'll take the girl's wishes to their ultimate extent. What follows is a tale of transformation hi-jinks.

Rules:
1.Each chapter is a minimum of 1000 characters.
2. Nudity is encouraged.
3.Girl-on-Girl is alright, no men though.
4.Basic grammar is enforced.

Fetishes:
Expansion of all kinds. Weight Gain to Breast Expansion to Feet Expansion, everything.
Inflatable Transformation.
Monster Girl Transformation.
Rubber Gal/Slime/Flattening Transformation.
Bimbofication-to an extent.

Not Allowed:
Gore
Underage
Water/Brown Works
